records.offence_description:
Improvement notice number 314115673 - Serial number - IN/RB/ID224/GO/15032024/01 - 
You have failed to prevent or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately control employees’ 
exposure to substances hazardous to health (namely metal working fluid, which is a respiratory sensitiser and can cause dermatitis) during:
1) Cleaning tasks when your employees use compressed air without control to clean down machined components and CNC machines which are coated with water-mixed metalworking fluid.
2) High-speed CNC machining which produces water-mixed metalworking fluid mist without adequate control implementation



Improvement notice - 314116053 Serial number -   IN/RB/ID224/GO/15032024/02 - You have failed to provide a suitable system of health surveillance for your employees who are exposed to substances hazardous to their health, namely metal working fluid, which can cause respirable diseases (including ocupational asthma and occupational hypersensitivity pneumonitis).



Improvement Notice number 314115607 - serial number IN/RB/ID224/GO/15032024/03 - You have failed to prevent or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately control employees’ exposure to substances hazardous to health caused by heating and agitation of Anopol 66 (namely 
sulphuric acid mist, which has the potential to cause severe irritation of the lungs and pulmonary oedema, and orthophosphoric acid mist, which can cause irritation to the eyes, throat and skin) as you do not have extraction fitted to your electropolishing tank.

Improvement Notice number 314116072 - Serial number IN/RB/ID224/GO/15032024/04 - You have failed to ensure that the extraction fitted to your high pressure CNC machine, which controls employees’ exposure to water-mixed metal working fluid (which can cause respirable diseases including occupational asthma and occupational hypersensitivity pneumonitis) has been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last fourteen months.

Prohibiton Notice number 314116139  - You have failed to prevent access to a dangerous part of machinery, namely the drill bit, by for example, provision of a chuck guard.
offence_breaches: Health and Safety At Work Act 1974 / 2 / 1
Control of Substances Hazardous to Health Regs 2002 / 7 / 1

records.offence_description:
IN/07/TAF/150324/01 - Dichloromethane is present within the Alloy Stripper and/or PCS 218 Booster, these products are used within your alloy wheel stripping tank. Through inhalation Dichloromethane vapour can suppress the central nervous system and lead to death. You have failed to prevent, or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately control exposure to Dichloromethane vapour because you do not have appropriate control measures in place such as suitable Local Exhaust Ventilation

PN/07/TAF/120324/01 - You have failed to ensure that exposure to dichloromethane is suitably controlled in that you have failed to provide local exhaust ventilation on the stripping tank and you respiratory protective equipment is not adequate
offence_breaches: Health and Safety At Work Act 1974 / 3 / 1
Control of Substances Hazardous to Health Regs 2002 / 7 / 1
